## SendableEthers.withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw DebtToken from Stability Deposit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentEthersTransaction<StabilityDepositChangeDetails>>;
```

**Returns:**

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./stablecoin-lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [ProtocolToken reward](./stablecoin-lib-base.stabilitydeposit.protocoltokenreward.md)<!-- -->.
